definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Study on Agricultural Socialized Service System in the Process of Building New Socialist Countrysides;
sentences.chinese: 社会化服务体系建设是发展非公有制林业的基本保障。

sentences.english: Non - public - owned organizations in China have achieved great development since the reform and opening up.
sentences.chinese: 改革开放以来，我国的非公有制经济有了快速的发展。

sentences.english: Is non-public ownership compatible with socialism? the traditional answer is negative.
sentences.chinese: 非公有制经济同社会主义相容吗？

sentences.english: The people's government controlled the nation's economy and set up a state-owned socialist economy.
sentences.chinese: 人民政府控制经济命脉并建立了公有制社会主义经济。

sentences.english: Non-publicly-owned economic organization is an important part of our economy.
sentences.chinese: 非公有制经济组织是我国经济的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: We should strengthen the supervision and administration of the non-public sectors according to law to promote their sound development.
sentences.chinese: 依法加强监督和管理，促进非公有制经济健康发展。

sentences.english: But today in the communistic society.
sentences.chinese: 那么，公有制社会的今天。

sentences.english: Tertiary industry and private economies are growing rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 第三产业和非公有制经济快速增长。

sentences.english: Some people prosper before others. The basis of socialism is public ownership of means of production.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义的基础是公有制，人民当家作主，共同致富。

sentences.english: The collectively-owned sector is an important component of the public sector of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 集体所有制经济是公有制经济的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Adhere to the ownership structure dominated by public ownership.
sentences.chinese: 坚持公有制为主导的所有制结构。

sentences.english: It also states the inevitability of development of non- public ownership forest in our country.
sentences.chinese: 阐明了我国非公有制林业发展的必然性。

sentences.english: The socialist state-owned economy is the mainstay of our national economy.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义公有制经济是我国国民经济的主体。

sentences.english: Nowadays, our Party and the State encourages developing private-owned forestry.
sentences.chinese: 党和国家鼓励非公有制林业发展。

sentences.english: The construction of social service system is a fundamental guarantee for developing non-public forestry.
sentences.chinese: 社会化服务体系建设是发展非公有制林业的基本保障。

sentences.english: Clearing the non-public economy socialist nature is of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 明确非公有制经济的社会主义性质具有重要意义。

definition: ownership of the means of production (in Marxism)/system of ownership
to nationalize/to take over as communal property
relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations

pinyin: ren2 min2 min2 zhu3 zhuan1 zheng4
